detaileddescription.para: Euphoria is a data-driven "game engine". It's in quotes because

listitem.para: it also contains other things that aren't related to game engine at all (like csv import and a non-realtime ray tracer)

detaileddescription.para: Euphoria is under heavy development, not ready for prime time, and the final product will be focused on live programming/automatic refresh between computer and target devices (that include computers) with a feature set that lies between love2d (do whatever you like) and fps game creator(restrictive but quick prototyping).

sect2.title: About the code
sect2.para: The folder structure should follow the pitchfork layout.

All names should follow snake_case, both for variables, members, functions and files. The only exception are C++ macros that should follow SHOUTING_SNAKE_CASE and structs & template arguments that should follow PascalCase. Convertion functions should either be named con if the convertion is obvious, otherwise it should be named c_foobar where foobar describes the conversion, casts are discouraged to the point of being forbidden outside of the 'convertion functions'.
